reviewText: I love the Ghost Hunters series.  I enjoy watching the group debunk situations people think are ghosts.  Finding the EVP's are always interesting.  I would recommend this show if you like seeing shows about ghosts.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I await the final season(I've got it ordered), but GHI was excellent.  They always had a good crew and miss the show.  I really enjoyed Barry at the helm, but to be fair, Rob was fabulous and I was sorry to see him leave.  I have no control behind the scenes with the personalities, but, the shows were ALWAYS top notch.
Title: N/A

reviewText: There are 13 episodes  in this DVD. The stories cover the Spirit of Robin Hood, Sweeney Todd, and haunted places such as Hamlet's Castle, Spirits in the Ukraine, Poland, Germany, Serbia and Scotland.The quality is excellent and provides 9 1/2 hours of viewing entertainment.  I always seem to miss them on regular TV. Now I can watch when it is convenient for me. There are 4 discs in this set.
summary: Ghost Hunting is fun with these guys
Title: N/A

reviewText: This set contains the final 13 episodes of Season 2.Episodes:214 July 14, 2010-The Spirit of Robin Hood-Nottingham, England - Galleries of Justice215 July 21, 2010-Sweeney Todd-Port Talbot, Wales - Margam Castle and Colnbrook, England - The Ostrich Inn216 July 28, 2010-Wolf's Lair-Ktrzyn, Poland - Wolf's Lair217 August 4, 2010-The Devil's Wedding-Halden, Norway - Fredriksten Fortress and Tallinn, Estonia - The Old House218 August 11, 2010-Demons of Nicaragua-Masaya, Nicaragua - Coyotepe Fortress and León, Nicaragua - Carcel XXI219 August 18, 2010-Pirates of the Caribbean-Omoa, Honduras - Fortaleza de San Fernando220 January 5, 2011-Hamlet's Castle-Helsingr, Denmark - Kronborg Castle221 January 12, 2011-Ghosts of the Eastern Bloc-Pidhirtsi, Ukraine - Pidhirtsi Castle and Reszel, Poland - Reszel Castle222 January 19, 2011-Unfaithful Spirit-Fürsteneck, Germany - Fürsteneck Castle223 January 26, 2011-Amsterdamned-Huissen, Netherlands - Huissen House and IJmuiden, Netherlands - IJmuiden Fortress224 February 2, 2011-Army of the Dead-Novi Sad, Serbia - Petrovaradin Fortress225 February 9, 2011-Shadows in the Dark-Edinburgh, Scotland - Usher Hall and Inveraray, Scotland - Inveraray Jail226 February 16, 2011-Soldiers of Misfortune-San Juan, Puerto Rico - El Morro Fortress and Tapia TheaterStarting with some of the first 2011 episodes, lead investigator Robb Demarest is replaced by Kris Williams of Ghost Hunters. She makes a good addition to the team as this show has had trouble keeping many of its investigators. This is a really good set and Wolf's Lair, Shadows in the Dark, and Pirates of the Carribean are the best episodes on this set.
